JUSTICE DAO

helping social movements scale
with DAOs and DeFi revenue streams

Mission

Accelerate the eredication of the world’s most pressing issues:

How

  • JusticeDAO Factory: A decentralized movement can’t be stopped. Our DAOs use conviction voting for effective self-organization that social movements need. 
  • JusticeDAO Fund: Never again will a social movement stall because of limited funds, our DeFi tools and investor network allow for sustainable financing until the last injustice has been eradicated.
    •  
  • International Justice Alliance: A global alliance of prominent justice-seeking web3 pioneers, investors, researchers, and activists.

Roadmap

The road towards a just and beautiful world

  • Initial launch & Seed funding
    Creation of JusticeDAO
    Promotion of International Ambassador Program
    1Hive CommonStack
  • $JUSTICE Token launch
    Launch of the $JUSTICE through a liquidity bootstrapping pool
    Development of DAO tooling for social movements
    Creation of DAOFactory on PrimeDAO
    PrimeDAO
  • Invite social movements to the ecosystem
    Connecting social movements to the JusticeDAO ecosystem
    Integrating as many oracle solutions to bring off-chain data on-chain to allow for social movements to better use DeFi in their daily activities
    Deployment on various decentralized protocols
    Harmony NEAR Aleo Aztec Stacks
  • Preparation for mass-adoption
    Creating web2-web3 DAO bridges to make DAOs as seamless of an experience as possible even for the non-literate
    Deployment on more decentralized and distributed protocols
    Agoric Holochain Mina Oasis
